chav1961.purelib.streams

Class StreamsUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • chav1961.purelib.streams.StreamsUtil

  • public class StreamsUtil
extends Object

    This is an useful utility class to support a lot of popular operations on streams.

    Since:
    0.0.2
    Author:
    Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961

                                      throws NullPointerException,

        Create Writer wrapper to convert it's nested content to format required

        Parameters:

        from - MIME type of source content

                     throws NullPointerException,

        Copy JSON content from parser to printer

        Parameters:
        source - source StAX parser
        target - target StAX printer.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - any of parameters is null
        IOException - any I/O errors
        SyntaxException - any JSON format errors
